item.title: SafeLab: an IoT Project
item.description: Introduction This project was created for the Internet of Things course 19/20 of the University of Bologna. Requirements We want to create an ambient intelligence system based on IoT devices and technologies for monitoring environmental parameters and people inside a room (e.g. IT laboratory).
